articles.description: No.21 seed Veronika Kudermetova ousted Naomi Osaka while two-time champion Victoria Azarenka kicked off her BNP Paribas Open with a solid win. US Open finalist Leylah Fernandez came back from the brink to advance to the third round.
articles.content: No.21 seed Veronika Kudermetova defeated former champion Naomi Osaka, 6-0, 6-4 to advance to the third round of the BNP Paribas Open. Kudermetova will face Marie Bouzkova for a spot in the Round of 1… [+7244 chars]
